# Data

```{r}

library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyr)
library(stringr)

# Read your two files
fl <- read_xlsx("Corporal Punishment – Students without Disabilities_export_Florida.xlsx")
nat <- read_xlsx("Corporal Punishment – Students without Disabilities_export_national.xlsx")

# Clean numeric columns (remove commas, convert to numeric)
fl_clean <- fl %>%
  mutate(
    State         = as.numeric(str_replace_all(State,         ",", "")),
    National      = as.numeric(str_replace_all(National,      ",", "")),
    `State Female`= as.numeric(str_replace_all(`State Female`,",", "")),
    `State Male`  = as.numeric(str_replace_all(`State Male`,  ",", ""))
  )

nat_clean <- nat %>%
  mutate(
    National        = as.numeric(str_replace_all(National,        ",", "")),
    `National Female`= as.numeric(str_replace_all(`National Female`,",", "")),
    `National Male`  = as.numeric(str_replace_all(`National Male`,  ",", ""))
  )
```
